name: Computer
description: An electronic device that processes information.

name: Processor
description: A chip that executes instructions in a computer.

name: Memory
description: Storage for data and programs in a computer.

name: Hard Drive
description: A device for storing digital data.

name: Solid State Drive
description: A fast storage device using flash memory.

name: Graphics Card
description: A component for rendering images and video.

name: Motherboard
description: The main circuit board of a computer.

name: Power Supply
description: A device that provides electricity to a computer.

name: Monitor
description: A display screen for computers.

name: Keyboard
description: An input device with keys for typing.

name: Mouse
description: An input device for pointing and clicking.

name: Operating System
description: Software that manages computer resources.

name: Software
description: Programs and applications for computers.

name: Programming Language
description: A language for writing computer programs.

name: Algorithm
description: A step-by-step procedure for solving problems.

name: Database
description: A structured collection of data.

name: Network
description: A system for connecting computers.

name: Internet
description: A global network of interconnected computers.

name: Router
description: A device that directs data in a network.

name: Modem
description: A device for connecting to the internet.

name: Wi-Fi
description: Wireless technology for network connectivity.

name: Bluetooth
description: A wireless technology for short-range communication.

name: Email
description: Electronic mail for digital communication.

name: Web Browser
description: Software for accessing the internet.

name: Website
description: A collection of web pages on the internet.

name: Search Engine
description: A tool for finding information on the internet.

name: Social Media
description: Platforms for online social interaction.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Computing services delivered over the internet.

name: Server
description: A computer that provides services to other computers.

name: Data Center
description: A facility housing many servers.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Computer systems that can perform tasks requiring intelligence.

name: Machine Learning
description: A method for computers to learn from data.

name: Neural Network
description: A computing system inspired by biological neural networks.

name: Robot
description: An automated machine capable of performing tasks.

name: Robotic Arm
description: A mechanical arm controlled by a computer.

name: Automation
description: The use of technology to perform tasks automatically.

name: Sensor
description: A device that detects and responds to input.

name: Actuator
description: A device that converts signals into motion.

name: Control System
description: A system for managing and regulating processes.

name: Programmable Logic Controller
description: A computer for controlling industrial processes.

name: Digital Camera
description: A camera that captures images digitally.

name: Digital Video Camera
description: A camera that captures video digitally.

name: Smartphone
description: A mobile device combining phone and computer.

name: Tablet
description: A portable computer with a touchscreen.

name: Laptop
description: A portable personal computer.

name: Printer
description: A device for producing physical copies of digital documents.

name: Scanner
description: A device for converting physical documents to digital.

name: 3D Printer
description: A device for creating three-dimensional objects.

name: Digital Storage
description: Methods for storing digital information.

name: Information Age
description: The era characterized by the use of information technology.
